device.name: ich10_lan_v2
device.desc: model of Intel® ICH10 Gb Ethernet controller
device.documentation: Gigabit Ethernet Controller in Intel® ICH10.
device.limitations:
• Flow Control is unimplemented.
  • Power Management is unimplemented.
  • Load configuration from non-volatile memory is unimplemented.
  • Adjust time in time sync (IEEE 1588) is unimplemented.
  • RSS interrupt to specific CPU is unimplemented.
